1131.content:
Alexander, called Alex, had an awkward growth spurt. He grew so quickly and it embarrassed him. He stayed home in his bedroom playing video games on his XBOX. He loved to play the alian games.

His growth spurt didn't just affect his growing taller, it caused him to grow facial hair, their he was with a mustach, it was light but nevertheless it was there. He was devastated by that and the fact that he was an average of four inches taller than all of his classmates. He was already 5'7 . Now at his age his voice began to crack causing further embarrassment for him.

He became shy and withdrawn, he refused to get out and enjoy the normal teen-age activities. He quit football and refused to go to the school dances and socials. His great passion was to play basketball, he dreamed of one day playing for The UK Wildcats.

Alex was a smart young man, he got good grades in school, he was already making plans for college even though it would be a few years before he woul be going. He wants to be able to design video games. He is wild about the video games that depict alian life forms.


His pass-time, other than video games , is to go exploring in the woods behind his house. There he has built a tree fort and it is filled with his secret things. It also has a stock pile of potatoe chips, soft-drinks and candy. Occasionaly he will invite his yournger brother to join him in the tree-fort, and the two of them play their pocket video games, and quietly eat up the goodies they have stored.

Little does he know he is about to have A BIG adventure. It was a very hot day so he put on his blue and black shorts ,a blue T-shirt with Batman on it and his awesome black and white vans. He left his bedroom and ran down the stairs where he was greeted by his mom. Hey Honey! she said. Hi Mom! What's for breakfast I'm hungry. Well sit down I made you some scrambled eggs and toast. Mmmmmmm! Thanks mom these are awesome, replied Alex. Your welcome sweetie! Mom said back. So where's dad this morning? Alex asked curiously. Oh! he's down in his lab. Why? she responded. I just wanted to ask if he could take me to the skatepark. Well just go down and ask him. So after Alex finished his eggs and toast he went down to his father's lab. Dad, Alex called out are you busy!? What is it Alex? Dad yelled. Alex walked over to his Dad. I was just wondering if you could take me to the skatepark so I can practice. He was about to put it down when he sneezed and it accidently spilled all over himself.Hey! Dad yelled come on son! Oh sorry dad Alex yelled back. As Alex ran upstairs he felt some tingling. 1341.content:
Walking in the door from school, thirteen-year-old Alec Robertson quickly tossed his backpack down next to the front door and kicked off his shoes.

Finally, he thought to himself.

School had seemed like it would never end. At least the house was empty. His obnoxious older brother must not have made it home just yet. Alec sighed to himself, knowing he'd probably be here soon. The poor teen couldn't stand him. Since they were little kids he'd been nothing but a bully.

Alec grabbed a cup from the cabinet and poured a glass of milk; he downed it in a short couple minutes before sticking his cup in the sink. Figuring he may as well enjoy the peace and quiet while he could, the boy headed upstairs to his room. As he entered, he locked the door behind him before turning on his television and flopping lazily across the bed. As he lay there, listening to some South Park episode coming from the speakers several feet away, he began to feel funny. Having recently experienced drunkenness for the first time, that's how he would describe the feeling washing over him. It felt like a lazy warm blanket. Before he even realized what was really happening, his head bumped into the headboard on the bed.

What the hell?!

Sitting up, he bumped his head on the ceiling. Once Alec realized what was happening, he quickly tried to race out his bedroom door so he could at least make it outside. However, he was already much too large to fit through his own doorway. Sitting cross-legged back on his bedroom floor, he decided to just relish in the feeling of his steady growth. Closing his eyes, he turned his mind off and paid no mind to the fact that he was getting bigger and bigger by the second. Soon enough, he felt the floor creaking below him and he braced to tumble through it. As he did, he felt the living room sofa flatten beneath his weight. None of it hurt at all. He had figured that he would have at least felt himself tumbling through the floor.

As time went on, Alec finally reopened his eyes once the feeling had subsided. He couldn't believe his eyes. He was sitting squarely on top of the remains of his former home. His white gym shorts and blue shirt had grown with him. After a few moments, the reality of the situation was setting in for Alec. He had always wanted to be a giant. He could think as far back to when he was a tot in diapers, all the fun he used to have capturing and playing with ants and other insects.

The only difference now was that those "insects" are people...
1341.title: Fast

13412.content:
As Alec looked around, he could see all of his hometown suburbia around him. He could even see his school in the distance. A smile came to the giant kid's face, and he began to stand up. Brushing the rubble off his backside, he watched it tumble back down to the ground. Looking down at his former house, he noticed the only two things still somewhat-intact were the garage and the basement. Just for fun, Alec raised his foot over the semi-crused garage that sat at the end of his driveway and rested it on the roof. Without applying any pressure, the black-haired giant boy smirked as he crushed it into splinters. His house had been entirely empty, he's sure. His older brother was at work along with his parents. There hadn't been any cars in the driveway.

Turning his attention to his neighbor's house on the right side, he saw their two boys out in the backyard. They were a year or two younger than himself; and currently transfixed on his towering form. Alec smiled with curiosity, and stooped down in front of them.

"Hi!" Alex spoke for the first time, scaring the pair out of their trance-like state. He giggled watching them fall back onto their butts.
